mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_MAIN(NUM, EMAIL, NICKNAME, PASSWORD) values(MEMBER_MAIN_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{password})
mapper.select: select EMAIL, NICKNAME from MEMBER_MAIN where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select EMAIL, NICKNAME, REGDATE, LOGINTIME from MEMBER_MAIN
select EMAIL, NICKNAME, REGDATE, LOGINTIME from MEMBER_MAIN where NICKNAME like '%'||#{nickname}||'%'
mapper.update: update MEMBER_MAIN set PASSWORD=#{newPassword} where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
mapper.select: select EMAIL, NICKNAME, LOGINOPTION from MEMBER_MAIN where SESSIONID=#{sessionId}
select NICKNAME from MEMBER_MAIN where EMAIL=#{email} and PASSWORD=#{password}
select count(*) from MEMBER_MAIN where EMAIL=#{email}
select count(*) from MEMBER_MAIN where NICKNAME=#{nickname}
select main.NICKNAME, main.PASSWORD, sub.WARNCOUNT from MEMBER_MAIN main, MEMBER_SUB sub where main.EMAIL=#{email} and main.NICKNAME = sub.NICKNAME
select main.EMAIL from MEMBER_MAIN main, MEMBER_ADDR addr where addr.PHONE1=#{phone1} and addr.PHONE2=#{phone2} and main.EMAIL like '%'||#{email}
select main.EMAIL from MEMBER_MAIN main, MEMBER_ADDR addr where addr.PHONE1=#{phone1} and addr.PHONE2=#{phone2} and main.EMAIL=#{email}

select main.EMAIL, main.NICKNAME, main.LOGINTIME, main.REGDATE, sub.NAME, sub.GENDER, sub.STOREDATE, addr.PHONE1, addr.PHONE2, addr.ADDRNUM, addr.ADDR, addr.ADDRSUB from MEMBER_MAIN main, MEMBER_SUB sub, MEMBER_ADDR addr where main.NICKNAME = sub.NICKNAME and sub.NICKNAME = addr.NICKNAME and addr.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
